entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 29 March 2023
